marketplace_gifts.name: Amazon.com Gift Card
marketplace_gifts.description: Available in the US. A gift card that can be used towards any product on amazon.com. This gift is sent in US Currency.
marketplace_gifts.redemption_instructions:
To get your Amazon.com gift card code, click Use Gift Now.

To redeem your gift card, follow these steps:

1. Visit www.amazon.com/gc
2. Click Apply to Account and enter the Claim Code when prompted.
3. Gift card funds will be applied automatically to eligible orders during the checkout process.
4. You must pay for any remaining balance on your order with another payment method.

Your gift card claim code may also be entered when prompted during checkout. To redeem your gift card using the Amazon.com 1-Click® service, first add the gift card funds to Your Account. If you have questions about redeeming your gift card, please visit www.amazon.com/gc-redeem or contact hello@giftbit.com.
marketplace_gifts.terms_and_conditions: Amazon.com Gift Cards ("GCs") sold by Kiind Inc., an authorized and independent reseller of Amazon.com Gift Cards. Except as required by law, GCs cannot be transferred for value or redeemed for cash. GCs may be used only for purchases of eligible goods at Amazon.com or certain of its affiliated websites. For complete terms and conditions, see www.amazon.com/gc-legal. GCs are issued by ACI Gift Cards, Inc., a Washington corporation. ©,®,™ Amazon.com Inc. and/or its affiliates, 2013. No expiration date or service fees.Kiind Inc., doing business as Giftbit, and/or Kiind, Corp, doing business as Giftbit through www.giftbit.com and/or through Giftbit's mobile application(s) and other services.

marketplace_gifts.name: Starbucks eGift Card
marketplace_gifts.description: Available worldwide. Starbucks Coffeehouses have become a beacon for coffee lovers everywhere. Why do they insist on Starbucks? Because they know they can count on genuine service, an inviting atmosphere and a superb cup of expertly roasted and richly brewed coffee every time. This gift is sent in US Currency.
marketplace_gifts.redemption_instructions: Enjoying your eGift is easy. Scan this barcode at Starbucks. Or print it out and bring it into any participating Starbucks store. Or transfer the amount onto your registered Starbucks Card to spend later by signing in at www.starbucks.com/account/signin. Treat this eGift like Cash.
marketplace_gifts.terms_and_conditions: Reload your eGift and check your balance at participating Starbucks stores, www.starbucks.com/card or 1-800-782-7282. Your Starbucks Card eGift may only be used for making purchases at participating Starbucks stores. It cannot be redeemed for cash unless required by law. Refunds can only be provided for unused eGifts with the original receipt. This eGift does not expire, nor does Starbucks charge fees. Complete terms and conditions available on our website. Or:

To redeem on your Mac or PC: 1. Open iTunes and click iTunes Store. Or open the Mac App Store on your Mac. 2. Click Redeem. 3. Enter code. 4. Shop the iTunes Store, the App Store, or the Mac App Store. 5. Download your content. Enjoy. To redeem on your iPhone, iPod touch, or iPad: 1. Tap iTunes. 2. Tap Music and scroll to bottom. 3. Tap Redeem. 4. Enter code. 5. Shop the iTunes Store, the App Store, or the iBookstore. 6. Download your content. Enjoy
If you have questions about redeeming your gift card, contact hello@giftbit.com.

marketplace_gifts.name: Target eGift Card
marketplace_gifts.description: Available in the USA only. Expect more, pay less with Target. Choose from a wide selection of furniture, baby, electronics, toys, shoes, etc. This gift is sent in US Currency.
marketplace_gifts.redemption_instructions:
To redeem your Target eGiftCard on Target.com:

1) Enter your Target eGiftCard number and access number when checking out

2) Your eGiftCard will automatically be applied

Follow the steps below to redeem your Target eGiftCard at a Target Store in the U.S. You will need a mobile phone with data (Please note that message and data rates may apply.):

1) Save your Target eGiftCard to your Mobile GiftCard account on your web-enabled phone, visit m.target.com/gc

2) Select My GiftCards within the My Target section

3) Create a Mobile GiftCard account (or sign in to your existing account) and save your eGiftCard

4) At checkout, a Target team member will scan the eGift Card from your web-enabled mobile device
marketplace_gifts.terms_and_conditions: If you have concerns, please contact customer service at 877-554-2186 or email support@giftbit.com. You may redeem this eGiftCard at any Target.com only or converted to a Target Mobile GiftCard and redeemed at Target stores in the U.S. This card is not redeemable for cash except as required by law. Kiind Inc., doing business as Giftbit, and/or Kiind, Corp, doing business as Giftbit through www.giftbit.com and/or through Giftbit's mobile application(s) and other services.

marketplace_gifts.name: Visa® virtual account
marketplace_gifts.description: The Visa® virtual account gives you the freedom to enjoy your reward anywhere online. With instant access to spending along with a unique top up feature, the Visa virtual account allows you to enjoy shopping online at your favorite online merchants. The Visa virtual account is a prepaid account that can be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted online, by phone or mail within the United States. PLEASE NOTE that sending this gift requires a minimum purchase amount. Please contact us at accounts@kiind.me for more information or create a gift order.
marketplace_gifts.redemption_instructions: To activate your prepaid account today, follow these steps: Copy the code below and click the "Activate my card" button Go to "Have a Reward Code?" from the options on the lower right hand side of the screen and choose "Click here to activate your reward." Enter your code in the field that pops up Follow the on-screen instructions to create your Virtual Visa account with Citibank Once created, your Virtual Visa card number may be used at the sites suggested on the Citibank website or online at any website where Visa is accepted This activation code will expire 60 days from the date of this email if not used. Once activated, your prepaid card will expire after 6 months.
marketplace_gifts.terms_and_conditions: If you have concerns, please contact customer service at 1-877-554-2186 or email hello@giftbit.com. This card is not redeemable for cash except as required by law. This account issued by Citibank, N.A. pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. and managed by Citi® Prepaid Services. This account can be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted online, by phone or mail within the United States.. marketplace_gifts.name: $5.00 East Side Mario'sÂ® E-Gift Card
marketplace_gifts.description: East Side Mario's is a chain of authentic Italian restaurants that offers great value, even better food, and a fun, lively atmosphere for the whole family.
marketplace_gifts.redemption_instructions: Click 'Claim Gift Card' or 'Select Gift' and then 'Show my code'. To redeem this card simply present the print out at any Swiss Chalet®, Montana's Cookhouse & Bar, Kelsey's®, Harvey's®, Milestones®, East Side Mario's®, Casey'?s Grill & Bar®, Bier Markt®, and Fionn MacCool®. For balance information, updated terms and conditions or to register for balance protection, visit www.theultimatediningcard.ca or request your card balance at any Cara restaurant.
marketplace_gifts.terms_and_conditions: Use of this E-Gift Card constitutes acceptance of the following terms and conditions: Treat this E-Gift Card as cash. E-Gift cards may only be used to purchase food and beverages at any participating Swiss Chalet®, Harvey’s®, Montana’s Cookhouse & Bar™, Kelsey’s®, Milestones Grill + Bar®, East Side Mario’s®, Casey’s Grill & Bar®, Bier Markt®, Fionn MacCool’s®, D’Arcy McGee’s®, Paddy Flaherty’s® and Tir nan Og® location in Canada. E-Gift Card value is in Canadian dollars. E-Gift Cards cannot be refunded or redeemed for cash, except as required by law. If the E-Gift card is lost, stolen or used with authorization, it cannot be replaced (unless it’s been properly registered for balance protection at www.theultimatediningcard.ca). Purchase amount will be deducted from the unused balance remaining on the E-Gift Card, with any excess purchase price payable at the time of purchase. Terms and conditions may be changed at any time, without notice. For balance information, updated terms and conditions or to register for balance protection, visit www.theultimatediningcard.ca or request your card balance at any Cara restaurant. For other inquiries, call Cara Guest Services at 1-866-636-2321. Issued by Cara Operations Limited. This card is not redeemable for cash except as required by law.
